definition: to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound

sentences.english: Mr. Panetta urged Beijing to be more 'transparent' about the advanced weapons it is developing.
sentences.chinese: 帕內塔敦促北京對正在研製的先進武器更加透明。

sentences.english: More important than these advanced weapons were larger-scale technological innovations such as the railroad.
sentences.chinese: 比這些先進武器更具有跨時代意義的新發明當屬鐵路。
